title: Harris County Sheriff's Office Departments Policies and Guidelines

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. The 2017-2021 general manuals on the operating procedures/guidelines and policies within the Harris County Sheriff's Office:
 SEXUAL OFFENSES 21.01 Texas Penal Code
 INVASIVE VISUAL RECORDING 21.15 Texas Penal Code

2. Any and all professional integrity, civil rights, internal affairs complaints, grievances, and corrective actions between the years of 2015 through 2023 filed against:
 Matthew Walker
 Shamanda Harris

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kristopher D. Carter

title: Harris County District Attorney's Office Policies and Guidelines

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. The 2017-2021 general manuals on the operating procedures/guidelines and policies within the Harris District Attorney's Office:
	SEXUAL OFFENSES 21.01 Texas Penal Code 
	INVASIVE VISUAL RECORDING 21.15 Texas Penal Code

2. Any and all professional integrity, civil rights, internal affairs complaints, grievances, and corrective actions between the years of 2017 through 2023 filed against:
	Kimbra Kathryn 'Kim' Ogg
	Jamie Michele Burro

3. Please provide this following information as it pertains to accuracy and validity towards all basis:
	Demographics on physical characteristics of offender(s) history of ALL case filings within these previous five years from Jamie Michele Burro.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kristopher D. Carter
